compliant.section: ROE will store and maintain the basic personal information you provide voluntarily to maintain the communication between you and ROE, such as sending information, newsletters, or e-mails...
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: Consent and Legitimate Interests

compliant.section: Without prior consent, ROE will never disclose, sell, or give your personal information to other irrelevant organizations for marketing or sales.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (Consent), Conditions for consent

non_compliant.section: ...until you raise a request to ROE for the termination of the storage directly or until the law requires termination of the storage of said information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') - General rule, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') - Exceptions
non_compliant.amend: The policy should be amended to clarify that individuals have a right to request deletion of their data (right to be forgotten) without undue delay, and ROE must comply unless there's a legitimate and lawful reason to retain the data as per Article 17(3).
